code: @Manual{,   title = {bhhicharts: Interactive Charts for BHHI},   author = {Eve Perry},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/ucsf-bhhi/bhhicharts, https://ucsf-bhhi.github.io/bhhicharts/}, }

title: Interactive Charts for BHHI
text: bhhicharts helps create interactive charts provides infrastructure embedding BHHI website. can take single chart set related charts render simple webpage can embedded BHHI Drupal site.

title: Interactive Charts for BHHI
text: can install bhhicharts GitHub :

title: Interactive Charts for BHHI
text: bhhicharts relies highcharter package create charts.

title: Interactive Charts for BHHI
text: creating chart: can rendered simple webpage BHHI theme logo applied. webpage can embedded BHHI Drupal site.
code: library(highcharter) #> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'quantmod': #>   method            from #>   as.zoo.data.frame zoo  scatter_chart = hchart(mtcars, "scatter", hcaes(x = wt, y = mpg, group = cyl)) |>    hc_xAxis(title = list(text = "Weight")) |>   hc_yAxis(title = list(text = "MPG")) |>   hc_legend(title = list(text = "Cylinders")) dir = tempdir()  bhhicharts::create_webpage(   scatter_chart, html_filename = "scatter-chart.html", root_dir = dir )

title: Interactive Charts for BHHI
text: bhhicharts can also render webpage chart picker allows viewer choose multiple charts. can useful, example, show different visualizations data different demographic groupings. creating another chart putting charts named list: set charts can rendered webpage:
code: column_chart = mtcars |>   dplyr::count(cyl, gear) |>    hchart("column", hcaes(x = cyl, y = n, group = gear)) |>   highcharter::hc_plotOptions(column = list(stacking = "normal")) |>    highcharter::hc_xAxis(title = list(text = "Cylinders")) |>     highcharter::hc_yAxis(title = list(text = "Count")) |>   highcharter::hc_legend(title = list(text = "Gears"))  charts = list("Column" = column_chart, "Scatter" = scatter_chart) bhhicharts::create_webpage(   charts, html_filename = "multiple-charts.html", root_dir = dir )

Render webpage with chart — create_webpage
text: Render webpage chart

title: Render webpage with chart — create_webpage
code: create_webpage(   chart_objects,   html_filename,   root_dir = ".",   page_title = "Chart",   initial_chart = NULL,   chart_picker_text = NULL,   view = TRUE )

title: Render webpage with chart — create_webpage
text: chart_objects Either single highcharterzero object list highcharterzero objects. html_filename Name saved html file. root_dir Path webpage root directory page_title text page's title element. initial_chart name list element initial chart show page first loaded. chart_picker_text character vector names charts show dropdown selection element. view View rendered page browser. Ignored running interactively.

title: Render webpage with chart — create_webpage
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() data(example_charts) create_webpage(   example_charts,   "example_charts.html",   "Example Charts",   "chart1",   c("Chart 1", "Chart 2", "Chart 3") ) }
